appetizers.name: Chips 'n Stuff
appetizers.description: Crunchy tortilla chips and other sundries.

appetizers.name: Cheese Sticks
appetizers.description: We wrapped some cheese in bread and fried it. Have some.

coldSands.name: BLT
coldSands.description: A sandwich with bacon, lettuce, and tomato on it, as the acronym suggests.

hotSands.name: Meatball Sub
hotSands.description: The meatest meatballs dripping with way too much sauce!

hotSands.name: Spicy Italian
hotSands.description: It's a sandwich we think seems kinda' Italian.

desserts.name: Chocolate Chip Cookie
desserts.description: Good ol' American chocolate chip cookie baked at some point during the past 72 hours.

desserts.name: Cookie Sandwich
desserts.description: Coma-inducingly sweet sandwich made from two of our chocolate chip cookies and a filling of creamcheese icing.

drinks.name: Sweet Tea
drinks.description: Iced tea loaded down with sugar.
